DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Property Set IFC any
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of support for IFC property sets, that are applicable to this "element" according to the IFC property set definitions.

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Property Set IFC Common
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of direct support for the IFC common property set (general naming convention Pset_<element>Common. Direct support includes the preconfiguration of the property set.</element>

DocTemplateDefinition.Name: Property Set User Defined
DocTemplateDefinition.Documentation: Provision of support for any user defined or system defined property set for this "element". Those property set names shall not start with "Pset_" prefix (not case sensitive).
